description.english: Begin the adventure for the first time
description.german: Beginne das Abenteuer zum ersten Mal

description.spanish: Comenzar la aventura por primera vez
description.schinese: 开始首次历险
description.tchinese: 開始首次歷險
description.japanese: 初めて冒険を開始

displayName.japanese: これはシミュレーション

description.english: Drop your first entity in the Sandbox
description.german: Platziere dein erstes Objekt in der Sandbox

description.spanish: Dejar tu primera entidad en el Sandbox
description.schinese: 将你的第一个实体放入沙盒
description.tchinese: 將你的第一個實體放入沙箱
description.russian: Поместите ваше первое существо в Песочницу

displayName.japanese: ゲームを楽しんでくれてありがとう

description.english: Finish the adventure
description.french: Finir l'aventure
description.italian: Termina l'avventura
description.spanish: Terminar la aventura
description.schinese: 完成历险
description.tchinese: 完成歷險
description.japanese: 冒険を終了

description.english: Unlock all entities for the Sandbox
description.german: Schalte alle Objekte für die Sandbox frei
description.french: Déverrouiller toutes les entités du SandBox
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le entità per il Sandbox
description.spanish: Desbloquear todas las entidades para el Sandbox
description.schinese: 解锁沙盒中的所有实体
description.tchinese: 解鎖沙箱中的所有實體
description.japanese: サンドボックスに全てのエンティティをアンロック

description.english: Save the Papyvorus from the Predator
description.german: Rette den Papyvorus vor dem Jäger
description.french: Sauver le Papyvorus du prédateur
description.italian: Salva il Papyvorus dal predatore
description.spanish: Salvar al papyvorus del depredador
description.schinese: 将食纸兽从捕食者手中救出来
description.tchinese: 將食紙獸從捕食者手中救出來
description.japanese: プレデターからパピヴォラスを助けよう

description.english: Finish chapter 6.4 without the tape recorder getting grabbed
description.german: Schließe Kapitel 6.4 ab, ohne dass der Kassettenrekorder geschnappt wird
description.french: Finir le chapitre 6.4 sans que le magnétophone soit attrapé.
description.italian: Termina il capitolo 6.4 senza che il registratore venga catturato
description.spanish: Terminar el capítulo 6.4 sin que cojan la grabadora
description.schinese: 完成6.4章，同时不要让录音机被夺走。
description.tchinese: 完成6.4章，同時不要讓答錄機被奪走。
description.japanese: チャプター 6.4をテープレコーダーを取られずに完了しよう

description.english: Ground Control to...

description.tchinese: 地面控制...

description.english: Set the sun on the horizon

description.tchinese: 將太陽設置在地平線上

description.english: Tie a balloon to a Predator

description.tchinese: 將一個氣球系在一個捕食者身上

description.english: Carry the tape recorder to the sinkhole area

description.koreana: 싱크홀이 있는 지역으로 테이프 레코더를 운반합니다
